dublin_core.dcvalue: E prescribing is coming of age It promises to reduce medication errors and adverse reactions from incompatible drug combinations This article provides an overview of the factors that have driven greater adoption of e prescribing principally the promulgation of HIPAA regulations and the Medicare Modernization Act of 2004 It discusses the financial considerations that have delayed the greater use of existing methodology addresses current government and industry initiatives and defines some of the standards that have been set forth to date
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T16:00:23Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2005-01-27
The Journal of medical practice management : MPM
